name: unconfirmed-request-pdu
description: Represents a BACnet Unconfirmed Request Protocol Data Unit (PDU), used to send unconfirmed service requests.

fields.name: pdu-type
fields.description: Identifies the type of the PDU.

fields.name: reserved
fields.description: Reserved for future use; shall be set to zero.

fields.name: service-choice
fields.description: Specifies the unconfirmed service being requested.

fields.name: service-request
fields.description: The actual unconfirmed service request data.
